solution.linktext: 注册 Refurbisher 计划 - 登录

supportoption.title: Microsoft Authorized Refurbisher 计划
supportoption.description: 获得 Microsoft Authorized Refurbisher 计划资格，有能力向企业、消费者和非营利组织提供预安装了正版 Microsoft 软件的翻新计算机。
supportoption.linkurl: http://www.microsoftpartnersupport.com/create-incident?mpnid=Unavailable&email=oemincentives@microsoft.com&supporttopicid_l1=计划和成员身份&supporttopicid_l2=方案&supporttopicid_l3=注册 Refurbisher 计划&locale=en-om&language=EN" target="_blank
